summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Hudson Street from 1st Avenue South to a connection with the existing pavement approximately 287 feet east thereof; and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16412 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
